      • solve

        public Solution<GT,​PT> solve​(Problem<PT> problem,
                                   Solution<GT,​PT> givenSolution)
        Description copied from interface: Algorithm
        Solves a problem and returns best found mapping. Starts search with the given mapping.
        Parameters:
        problem - problem to be solved
        givenSolution - start search with this mapping
        Returns:
        best mapping that was found with alg

      • reset

        protected void reset()
        Helper function that resets the state of the genetic algorithm as if it never did anything NOTE: This does not currently reset the analytics. Thus tests will look very weird

      • nextGeneration

        public Solution<GT,​PT> nextGeneration​(Problem<PT> problem)
        Calculates one single generation until all generations are full If all generations have been calculated, it returns null
        Returns:
        best individual of the next generation, or null

      • bestQuality

        public Solution<GT,​PT> bestQuality​(Solution<GT,​PT> solution,
                                         Solution<GT,​PT> givenSolution)
        Calculate the bestQuality of the two solutions. Returns the mapping with the better quality.
        Parameters:
        solution - mapping to compare
        givenSolution - previous best mapping to compare
        Returns:
        new best mapping

      • getPopulation

        public List<Solution<GT,​PT>> getPopulation()
        Returns a COPY of the current population. The state of this is: - Before first step - Empty - After each step - The population that will be the PARENT of the next generation - After Execution - The lastly created population
        Returns:
        a copy of the current population

        Returns:
